title: Let’s Have a Blast!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Wow, Akihabara is so crowded!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It really is~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Did we arrive late!? Let’s hurry up, both of you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Now, now Honoka, hold on a bit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That’s right, Honoka-chan. The decorations start here, so let’s take our time and enjoy the view.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s true, but... I wanna go now~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ah, look over there! Our pop-up! There are posters too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>There’s one over here, too~! This is awesome!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wow! Let’s take pictures of everything~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
